page.title: 06MONT ORGUEIL CASTLE (5)
page.content:
Hurrying up more steps we come to the{Mount Gate.}As we turn right through an archway we come to{St. {George's Hall,}inside the{Somerset {Tower,}where we see the fireplace halfway up the wall. This is because the original wooden floors of the Hall on the first floor have disappeared, and you can still see the notches where the joists fitted into the wall.
Out of these rooms we come to the 13th century{St. Mary's Chapel,}and going down 14 spiral stairs to{St. {Mary's Crypt,}with three windows and a view of the harbour.
Next we enter the{Keep,}where there are waxwork tableaux, telling of the principal events in the history of the castle.
